code:
%% Translatable Attachments flow
flowchart LR
  subgraph DB[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    A[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
  end

  M[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> A

  Init[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
  Init -->|require backend| B[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
  Init -->|register backend| Mobility[HealthTech_PatientRecords]

  B -->|provides| Apply[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]

  ModelCanonical[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
  ModelDSL[HealthTech_PatientRecords]

  ModelCanonical --> Apply
  ModelDSL --> Apply

  Apply -->|defines associations| Assoc[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
  Apply -->|defines accessors| Accessors[HealthTech_PatientRecords]

  View[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
  View -->|uploads per-locale| Controller

  Controller[HealthTech_PatientRecords] -->|permits locale params or maps| Model
  Model -->|writer methods| ActiveStorage[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
  ActiveStorage --> A

  Serve[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] -->|serves blob| UserBrowser[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]

  Accessors -->|getter fallback| Fallback[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
  Fallback --> ActiveStorage

  classDef infra fill:#f8f9fa,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px;
  class DB,Init,B,Apply,Assoc,Accessors,View,Controller,ActiveStorage,Serve,Fallback infra;
license_name: GNU Lesser General Public License v3.0
repo_description: The Better Together Community Engine is an accessible open source community platform that's Democratic by Design. All are welcome!
